2: If you do not show up to board the bus, no refund or ticket change will be made.
3: The company is not responsible for trip delays or cancellations due to unforeseen situations, such as extreme weather conditions, traffic accidents, or technical problems with the buses.
4: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.

6: We reserve the right to change our privacy policies at any time, and any changes will be posted on our website. It is your responsibility to review our privacy policies regularly to stay up to date.
